evidence.claim: Utilizing AWS services for cloud infrastructure including Lambda and S3 for application hosting and data storage.
The company follows HIPAA guidelines to ensure patient data privacy and security in health tech solutions.
Implemented FHIR standards for healthcare data interoperability and integration with EHR systems.
Describes integration patterns using RESTful APIs for service communication and event-driven architecture.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or EDI-related activities found on their site.
